entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:24 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
